title: hostel availability
content: I've taken admission into cse rr campus and will be flying to Bangalore on 16th aug just wanted to know whether the hostel seats will be vacant or not please let me know.

comments.body: Have you booked/paid any amount yet?
No I can't they're not allowing me to book seats as I can't travel to Bangalore and they want the candidate one of parents and a local guardian (age >35)

Ah shit

What are the hostel booking days as said by the hostel?
They said you can come and book seat anytime before class begins if seats are vacant though
Then it will be there, but your priority number will be low, you may not get the room you want
Can you please tell how many hostel seats are there in hostels?
